case.name: Thor Shipping A/S v The Ship "Al Duhail" [2008] FCA 1842 (5 December 2008)

citphrases.citphrase: meaning of the phrase 'the owner' in part iii of the admiralty act 1998 (cth)
completion of sale before the commencement of proceeding but after cause of action arose
vendor being the 'relevant person' remained entered as owner on the liberian register
whether the phrase 'the owner' necessarily includes the registered owner irrespective of the terms and state of completion of the underlying transaction
vendor held not to be 'the owner'.
